data.name: Heartbound - OST
data.detailed_description:
You can find your installed soundtrack here

Steam\steamapps\common\Heartbound\OST

This is the full soundtrack for Heartbound plus a number remixes, test songs, and otherwise unreleased tracks.
Additional songs will be added to this pack as we release more chapters of the game.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/567380/

Track List

  • A Fond Memory
  • A F0nd M3m0ry
  • 4 f0n6 W3w05y
  • A Moment In Time
  • A New Day
  • At the Spine of the World
  • Barons Heart
  • Binders Void
  • Bitter Shadows
  • Cirsi
  • Cold
  • Dadrobics
  • Down the Rabbit Hole But Not the One In Animus
  • Elevation
  • Gone in the Night
  • Hey Buddy
  • Hot
  • Joe Regular but with Sunglasses
  • Joe Regular
  • Lore the Handyman
  • Middle Management
  • Office Dad
  • Office Post Office
  • OScar
  • OScar Quest
  • Overture
  • Server Hop
  • Space Lasers
  • Stamp It Away
  • Suspension
  • Terminated
  • The Fat Cat Swing
  • Throne of Fire
  • Throne of Frost
  • Top Floor Tango
  • Towering Shadows
  • You Don't Belong Here

data.short_description: The original sound track for Heartbound.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is locked to 60 frames per second.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is locked to 60 frames per second.
